attributes.action: Take DAVID Cameron into custody to prevent him rushing off to Greece to offer our taxpayer pounds to help take the pressure off the EU.
attributes.additional_details: You have a duty to protect the people of this land from the party politicking of our dishonourable electeds.  Exercise that properly by putting DAVID Cameron in jail and keep him there until Greece and the EU sort themselves out after the left wing vote.  We taxpayers simply do not want him rushing off carrying bucketsful of our taxes which he can hand to the Greeks to try to look like he is an international statesman, and not the political minnow he really is.
